content: ## ⚠️ Do not use the Kristal "Test Mod" as a learning reference, or a place to copy code from.

The "Test Mod" is a mod created by the Kristal Developers (and people who make contributions) to test certain engine features. As such, it is **not intended to be used as a reference.** It's often times *not* what you should do, as they're for testing specific features. It is no longer publicly available for this reason, as users would constantly ignore the warnings set in place. While it is not impossible to obtain a copy, please refrain from sharing it around.

Often times, you'll be copying code which is **not what you should actually be doing**. This is important because it'll be harder to help you in those cases, and there's already enough people to help.

Also... you should *really* not use other people's code without asking them, unless they give explicit permission.

If you decide to use content from the testing mod, we will not be able to provide any support. Ignoring these warnings mean you're on your own.

If you end up telling *other people* to use the testing mod, then we reserve the right to restrict your access to the help channels. These warnings are here for a reason -- please don't ignore them.
